full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN LA BRTEN NAS RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL KHA BSKANG DANG BCAS PA'I GO RIM BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RTA MGRIN LA BRTEN NAS RTA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL KHA BSKANG DANG BCAS PA'I GO RIM 'DI NI, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS DANG, SU MA TI KARMAS MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS LA ZHI BYAS CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG RNAMS GA-YANG 'GUGS 'DI NYID KYI TSUL DANG MTHUN PAR 'GAL MED KHA BSKANGS LEGS PA'I DON THAMS CAD KYI 'DON CHA LAG TU BLANG BDE BA'I LUGS SU PHYOGS GCIG TU SU MA TI MING CAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA 'DIS KYANG, BLA MA YI DAM MKHA' 'GRO CHOS BSRUNG NOR LHA RNAMS KYIS MTHUN RKYEN GANG BSAM YID BZHIN SGRUB LA GA-YEL MED MDZAD CING, BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DBUL 'PHONGS KYI SDUG BSNGAL LA SOGS PA MI MTHUN PA'I PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG ,)
